  • Method Details

    • closeSocket

      void closeSocket()
      disconnect this player

    • sendBoardState

      void sendBoardState(int size, int[][] state)
      send the complete state of the board to this player
      Parameters:
      size - edge length of the hexagon in the center of the board, in tiles
      state - the state

    • removePiece

      void removePiece(int[] pieceInfo)
      tell the player which piece should be replaced by an empty tile
      Parameters:
      pieceInfo - x and y coordinates

    • addPiece

      void addPiece(int[] pieceInfo)
      tell the player which piece should be put on a tile
      Parameters:
      pieceInfo - x, y and the piece number

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage(String content)

    • listen

      byte[] listen() throws IOException
      listen for a move
      Returns:
      4 bytes: x1, y1, x2 and y2 of a move
      Throws:
      IOException

    • queryNumPlayers

      int queryNumPlayers()
      Returns:
      number of players to play in this game

    • queryGameRules

      RulesInterface queryGameRules()
      Returns:
      rules of this game

    • sendTheirTurn

      void sendTheirTurn()
      tell the player to move

    • sendEndOfMove

      void sendEndOfMove()
      tell the player he has up-to-date board state
